info.name: IBM Verse - Inbox Enhancements - SnowWhite ADDON
info.description: This style is an addon style to "IBM Verse - Inbox Enhancements" and as such it does not work without that style. This style only brings some SnowWhite flavoured customisation to that magnificent style (Respect goes to RSCHOON).
info.additionalInfo:
__Changes:__
2016-09-21-Wed-11-51-42
- MOD - .seq-window class simplified and changed to compensate for the top white bare due to the hiding of top navigation bar.
2016-04-11-Mon-01-58-02
- Left sidebar bottom whitespace removed
- Overall bottom white stripe removed (was there because of the removed top IBM navigation bar)
- imageblocker / "open in notes" disclaimer box adjusted, it is visible from now on
2015-11-09-Mon-11-07-58
- ADD - Item list & Item Preview overlap with calendar bar FIX
2015-09-30-Wed-11-39-40 
- ADD - Open in notes disclaimer
2015-09-25-Fri-10-44-51 
- CHG - layout fixes
2015-09-25-Fri-01-15-55 
- CHG - followup fixes
